name: Basikasingo Heron Spirit
shortLoreBlurb: Basikasingo Heron Spirit is a spirit from DRC (Kivu) associated with river, fishing. Appeased for safe passage and rains.

description: Basikasingo Heron Spirit is a spirit from DRC (Kivu) associated with river, fishing. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
